sort() - Method in class pl.put.poznan.sortingmadness.logic.SortingContext
The sort() method is the main method responsible for calling the sort function for each algorithm in algorithms list (provided through setAlgorithms() method) The measured times are stored in times ArrayList as Long values.

SortingContext<T extends Comparable<T>> - Class in pl.put.poznan.sortingmadness.logic
